channel.title: Unincorporated: Witchy Little Town (2-shot in February)
channel.description:
There’s something in the air, a sense of change on its way. Are those flowers blooming under the snow? Whatever it is, the world feels alive and shimmering with power.
This is a **two-shot** of [ **Unincorporated** ](https://bethanyharvey.itch.io/unincorporated), by Bethany Harvey. **Unincorporated** is a mostly GM-less collaborative story game. We’ll be using the [Weird Little Town](https://bethanyharvey.itch.io/weird-little-town) playset with just a few changes inspired by *The Craft, Practical Magic, Kiki’s Delivery Service, Sabrina* (with or without the *Chilling Adventures* ) and other small town stories about witches living their lives and handling what the world throws at them, which might include petty drama, long-held grudges, hopeless love affairs, and whatnot.
The game will be played via **Streamyard** (video optional) and recorded if all players consent. No familiarity with the game is required as rules will be taught! Sessions will run for **3 hours** with 5-10 minute breaks at the hour. Attendance at both sessions is highly recommended but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
Romance may be a part of the game, but we will calibrate tone and subject matter at the table. Look for an email approximately a week before the session!
**Lines & Veils** , **Script Change** , **X Card** , and the **Open Door policy** will be the safety tools in use and this game will be run in accordance with the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
RSVP Open Access Time: January 18, 10:30 am (GMT -8)
